name: Spamgeon: Uncanned
description:
Build your party. Delve the dungeon's depths. Claim the glory you are so dearly owed. One caveat: you only have one button.

Spamgeon is a dungeon crawling party building RPG game in which you manage your ability to hit one button as quickly as you can without causing serious damage to yourself or your keyboard. Face the ever more fearsome monsters of the Spamgeon, or challenge a friend to see who has the fastest hand in town.

Dustin Brown - Programmer & Game Design

Kate Cartwright - Art
